name: Enhance the Ability of Emergency Medical Services (EMS) to transport patients with highly infectious  diseases (HID)
objective: Enhance state and local level emergency medical services operational plans for the management of confirmed or suspected high consequence infection disease, such as Ebola.
top_agency_name: Department of Health and Human Services
applicant_types: Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

authorizations.text: Title VI of Division G of the Consolidated and Continuing Appropriations Act, 2015 and section 311 of the Public Health Service Act, as amended.
